dcterms:creator: R. Lowe
N. Pow
I. Serban
J. Pineau
dcterms:description: The Ubuntu Dataset contains 1,422,295 training dialogues and 370,573 testing dialogues, each consisting of four to five utterances. The dataset focuses on response selection, using the top 1,000 most common messages for evaluation.
dcterms:title: Ubuntu Dataset

dcterms:creator: S. Zhang
E. Dinan
J. Urbanek
A. Szlam
D. Kiela
J. Weston
dcterms:description: The Persona Dataset was developed for personalized dialogue agents and contains a total of 162,064 utterances over 10,907 dialogues. It includes a training set of 1,000 dialogues and a testing set of 968 dialogues, with a unique evaluation method that samples responses.
dcterms:title: Persona Dataset
